誗字的基本解释

誗
chán
话讲得漂亮。

誗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》直廉切，平鹽，澄。］
(1)谓话语有益而美妙。
(2)作人名用字。唐有秦誗。见唐柳宗元《故襄阳丞赵君墓志》。又有褚誗。见《新唐书·玄宗纪》。

誗字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誗； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1162第09
【廣韻】直廉切【集韻】持廉切，?音㶣。言美利也。　又人名。副將褚誗、卜人秦誗，?見【唐書】。　又【玉篇】【集韻】?直嚴切，㙷平聲。義同。

誗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
誗字的起名意思

暂无。

Barberry
Basic explanation of words
Barberry
chán
The words are beautiful.
Barberry
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" straight cut, flat salt, clear. ]
(1) It is said that words are beneficial and beautiful.
(2) Use words for names. Tang You Qin Tang. See Tang Liu Zongyuan's Epitaph of Cheng Zhao Jun, Xiangyang. There is also Chu Tang. See "New Tang Book·Xuanzong Ji".
Barberry
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Ji 1】【Words Department】　誗; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1162 Page 09
[Guang Yun] Zhilian cut [Ji Yun] Lian cut,? Yin 㶣. Yan Meili also.　Another name. Vice-general Chu Tang and Bu Ren Qin Tang, please see 【Book of Tang】.　[Yu Pian] [Ji Yun]? Straight and strict, 㙷 flat sound. The same meaning.
